data.text:
Greater Lafayette Commerce (GLC) is the regionâs local economic development organization (LEDO) and chamber of commerce.

Principally serving the cities of Lafayette, West Lafayette, and Tippecanoe County, Indiana,Â GLC helps lead economic and workforce development initiatives across the entire region.Â Greater Lafayetteâs workforce laborshed stretches across nine Indiana counties, both east and west of the I-65 corridor between Indianapolis and Chicago.

Our regional economy continues to grow in size, as does the mix of industries and smart people working here. Â World-class manufacturers like Subaru of Indiana Automotive, Wabash National, GE Aviation, Caterpillar, and Saab are among the region's most recognizable employers. Â More people are employed in Greater Lafayette than ever and the jobs of the future continue to be created here.

Without a doubt, this is one of theÂ smartest working regionsÂ on the planet. Â Of course, we are proud to be the home of Purdue University, which is among the U.S.'s most respected research and educational institutions. Â We are proud to be makers, thinkers, and paradigm-breakers. Â Thatâs why we recently launched our new regional brand, which celebrates all that makes us Greater. Â We encourage you to click the Learn More button below to read more about our region, its workforce, and the many ways we work together to help existing companies grow and welcome to new companies to our community.

Whether you are exploring a new home or location for your existing company or starting a brand new one, we have the local expertise, partnerships, and programs to help you find your workforce or your next generation of intellectual property. Â Each day we work to help others connect, recruit and explore.

Be it site selection, local incentives, workforce challenges, or connections to Purdue, no request is too small. Â We would love to learn more about you, your company, and your plan for growth.Â Contact us to get started.

For more information, contact:

Greater Lafayette Commerce

Economic & Workforce Development Team
